name: ¡Córrele, Ernesto!
description:
The main level begins when you start moving. 

CONTROLS:

  • Hold LEFT ARROW / RIGHT ARROW to move 
  • Tap UP ARROW to JUMP
  • If you have a CHILE tap UP ARROW again after JUMPING/FALLING to DOUBLE JUMP.
  • Use the mouse to click

OBJECTIVES:

  • Get to Abuela's house as fast as possible! We don't want her food to go cold. She's depending on you!
  • Collect HORCHATA to INCREASE SPEED
  • Collect RED CHILES to acquire one time double jump. Use it wisely. 
  • AVOID RED SQUARES
  • Go for GOLD!

PRESS R to RESTART

PRESS P to return to Main Menu.

M toggles music

For Windows Version:

Press F to toggle full screen/window mode. 

  1. Download
  2. Extract the zip file 
  3. Play!

------------------------------------------------------

Follow Ernesto as he hurries to deliver food to his abuela, Carmen. She's been working so much lately that sometimes she's too tired to even cook for herself. Ernesto, being the loving grandson that he is, decides he will make three dishes to take to her. However, his only mode of transportation is using his legs! So you must help Ernesto get to his Abuela's house as fast as possible!

All music created by Ricardo Aviles

Note to players:

Thanks for playing this game made for the Latinx in Gaming Unidos Game Jam. This is my first game jam as a solo dev. I appreciate any comments/feedback. There wasn't much time to make this so there will be bugs. However, I hope you find this slice of game to be enjoyable. Post your best times in the comments. Can you get GOLD?

Additional Credits:

GUI buttons and Cursor Art by Vyrell on itch.
